Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<java.lang.Object>
public class Client
extends Observable
implements Observer<java.lang.Object>
It represents the client and takes care of receiving and sending messages to the server and updating the client-side status
